title: 137: Porygon
description: I write the summaries, and i think porygon is illogical.
long_description:
I write the summaries, and i think porygon is illogical. 

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), Christopher
